data.actual_result: send to the last server channel/group/friend you have/had opened
data.expected_result: let's you select where it's going to or says who it is going to
data.short_description: Sharing a post/picture from an external source (Facebook, etc.) to Discord does not show you who you are sending to till after sent
data.steps_to_repro: - go-to an app that allows sharing (like Facebook)  - share to Discord
